title: Replay Ep 89: Let's Talk About Sex with Vanessa Marin

description:
Hi listeners! We’re taking a break this today, but please enjoy one of our favorite Forever35 episodes from September 2019.


This week, Kate sees her fave band Phish and dances like no one was watching, starts buying second-hand clothing, and finds a new hobby in making friendship bracelets, and Doree travels with Henry for the first time, gets real about organizing her home, and takes Twitter off all of her devices. Then they welcome sex therapist Vanessa Marin to talk all things sex. She breaks down low-sex drives, the female orgasm, her favorite vibrators, and communicating with your partner.


View the original show notes here. 


This episode is sponsored by: 

FIGS - For 15% off your first purchase from FIGS, go to wearfigs.com and enter promo code FOREVER at checkout.

THIRDLOVE - Get 15% off your first purchase when you go to thirdlove.com/fFOREVER.

MOLEKULE - For 10% off your first order, visit molekule.com and enter FOREVER10 at checkout.

BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.

IN THE BUBBLE - Listen to In The Bubble by Lemonada Media for a not-scary, non-partisan, and kid-friendly resource on Coronavirus. 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
